post.desc:
Can't wait for Keiki to unleash all those Mayumi Mk2s on Gensōkyō.

***Jō*** (杖) is staff.

***Tō*** (刀) is sword.

Oh, and the ***-yumi*** (弓) part in her name is bow.

Yeah, girl has three weapons in her name. So maybe it's a [Swiss knife](https://youtu.be/-egR4Nwd-CE&t=157)? At least, another bow-drawing character would be nice.
